## FieldNavigationPolicy.getParent() method

Returns the parent block of the given field.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  current | [Field](./blockly.field_class.md)<!-- -->&lt;any&gt; | The field to navigate from. |

**Returns:**
